articles.title: Jennifer Lopez: 'Heartsick' singer cancels US tour to spend time with family - BBC.com
articles.description: Ticket firm Live Nation says the singer is " taking time off to be with her children, family and close friends".
articles.content:
Guy Lambert,Entertainment Reporter, @guybertie
Jennifer Lopez has said she is "devastated" after cancelling the US leg of her This Is Me... Live tour.

articles.title: All Santander staff and millions of customers have data hacked - BBC.com
articles.description: Their data is being sold online by the same gang who this week claimed to have hacked Ticketmaster.
articles.content:
Hackers are attempting to sell what they say is confidential information belonging to millions of Santander staff and customers.

articles.title: Israel has offered ceasefire and hostage proposal to Hamas, says Biden - Sky News
articles.content:
Israel has offered a comprehensive new ceasefire deal to Hamas, according to US President Joe Biden.
